Title: CREATOR views own secret (pre-reveal)
Preconditions: User logged in; User created a secret
Steps: 1. Log in | 2. Create secret | 3. Copy link | 4. Open link in same browser | 5. Observe alerts | 6. Observe header
Expected Result: Yellow warning: 'You created this secret'; Dashboard link visible (not signup CTA)

Title: CREATOR views own secret (post-reveal)
Preconditions: User logged in; Has own secret link
Steps: 1. Navigate to own secret | 2. Click View Secret | 3. Observe alerts | 4. Observe burn control
Expected Result: Brand notice: 'You viewed your own secret'; Burn button visible

Title: AUTH_RECIPIENT views someone else's secret
Preconditions: Two accounts exist; Account A created secret
Steps: 1. Login Account A | 2. Create secret | 3. Copy link | 4. Logout | 5. Login Account B | 6. Visit link | 7. Observe alerts | 8. Observe marketing | 9. Observe header
Expected Result: NO owner warning; NO marketing upsell; Dashboard link visible

Title: ANON_RECIPIENT views secret without login
Steps: 1. Open incognito | 2. Navigate to link | 3. Observe alerts | 4. Observe marketing | 5. Observe header | 6. Click View | 7. Observe burn
Expected Result: NO owner warning; Marketing upsell visible; Signup CTA visible; NO burn button

Title: Loading state displays basic dashboard
Steps: 1. Open DevTools | 2. Network tab | 3. Enable Slow 3G | 4. Navigate /dashboard | 5. Observe initial | 6. Wait complete
Expected Result: DashboardBasic shows during load; Correct variant after

Title: Basic variant for users without team capability
Preconditions: Free tier account without team capability
Steps: 1. Login basic account | 2. Navigate /dashboard | 3. Observe content | 4. Observe teams | 5. Look for upgrade
Expected Result: DashboardBasic renders; Secret form visible; NO teams section

Title: Empty variant for users with capability but no teams
Preconditions: Account with team capability; Zero teams
Steps: 1. Login capable account | 2. Ensure no teams | 3. Navigate /dashboard | 4. Observe onboarding | 5. Look for Create CTA
Expected Result: DashboardEmpty renders; Create team prompt visible

Title: Single variant for users with exactly one team
Preconditions: Account with team capability; Exactly 1 team
Steps: 1. Login | 2. Ensure 1 team | 3. Navigate /dashboard | 4. Observe team | 5. Observe actions

Title: Multi variant for users with multiple teams
Steps: 1. Login | 2. Ensure 2+ teams | 3. Navigate /dashboard | 4. Observe grid | 5. Look for View all | 6. Click team
Expected Result: DashboardIndex renders; Team cards shown; View all link present

Title: Error state with retry functionality
Preconditions: User logged in with capability; Can block API
Steps: 1. Open DevTools | 2. Network tab | 3. Block teams API | 4. Navigate /dashboard | 5. Observe error | 6. Observe retry | 7. Unblock | 8. Click retry | 9. Observe
Expected Result: Error: 'Unable to load teams'; Retry button works; Recovers without refresh
